snippet: Security officials moved on Tuesday to crush an outbreak of violence that included what the Interior Ministry called a terrorist ambush on mosque worshipers in a minority Shiite community.
abstract: Saudi Arabian security officials move aggressively to crush an outbreak of anti-Shiite violence, arresting 15 people in six cities; kill two others in connection with what Interior Ministry calls a terrorist ambush on mosque worshipers in minority Shiite community.
lead_paragraph: Security officials moved on Tuesday to crush an outbreak of violence that included what the Interior Ministry called a terrorist ambush on mosque worshipers in a minority Shiite community.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Takes Action After Shiites Are Attacked
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Takes Action After Shiites Are Attacked
